attributes.action: Ben Ainslie - needs to be made SIR BEN AINSLIE for services to Yachting.
attributes.additional_details:
Has now won his 4th GOLD medal and this is so incredible.

The man is a legend and an inspiration to the youth of tomorrow.

We are an Island and owe so much to Sailors - who basically have made us what we are today.

Others have been knighted for less !

He deserves to be known as Sir Ben.
